Bike and Build

Campaigning for the affordable housing cause with bike rides across the USA.

Context

In 2012, I took a cross-country cycling trip in support of affordable housing with an organization called Bike & Build. It was the time of my life. A year later I was given the opportunity to design the majority of the organization's marketing collateral. This included Jerseys, Brochures, and Annual Reports. I helped the organization unify their visual brand and shift from their existing PDF report into a responsive, web-based version.

→ 2015 Annual Report

Annual Report

The most recent annual report was a joint effort at Morf Studio. You can read more about the process here.
